value.code:
setFilter(e.target.value)} className="pl-7 pr-3 py-1 text-xs bg-[var(--bg-primary)] border border-[var(--border-primary)] rounded w-40 text-[var(--text-primary)] placeholder:text-[var(--text-muted)] focus:outline-none focus:border-[var(--accent-primary)]" />
} size="sm" tooltip={showAll ? 'Show running only' : 'Show all'} active={showAll} onClick={() => setShowAll(!showAll)} />

[
                  { label: 'Ports', value: container.ports.length > 0 ? container.ports.map(p => p.publicPort || p.privatePort).join(', ') : '-' },
                  { label: 'Created', value: formatRelativeTime(container.created) },
                ]
